system.description:
Taught by Hiling Makar as he was well versed in the arts of the bow before becoming the first Swordfish Cavalier. With this, you fire a piercing jet of water from your bow, shredding through armor.

Spend 1 Beat to Rush 3 and then gain +1 Attack Tooth on your next Water Attack. This Rush ignores Water Terrain.

Soak: +1 Beat to inflict Water Vulnerability (2) on all enemies adjacent to you after the Rush.
